title: Archivator main config File
description: The main configuration file for the Archivator where we can manage multiple archives. See http://archivator.site for details.

$schema.description: Part of the JSON Schema standard, this optional keyword declares the URL of the schema that the file conforms to. Editors may download the schema and use it to perform syntax highlighting.

archives.description: A list of archives managed by this tool.

archiveFolder.description: The path to the archive folder relative to the archivator.json config file, where there must be an archivator.csv index file.
